Package com.example.ex3_goldman_nachman

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AddThread
    This class used like a controller, that mean - it's handles any request to crawl a URL by create a Crawler thread for him.
    Crawler
    This class implements Runnable and the implements Crawler functionality - by getPageImgs function, the function search for images in given URL.
    CrawlerMap
    The main container of this program, holds the session ID as a key, and Crawler as a value.
    Index
    Introduces the index.html page, this is the first Servlet.
    Listener
    This is a listener to context initialing, when this happens the listener create CrawlerMap instance.
    SeeResult
    This servlet introduce the results of images searching process.
